notes: USA-based bulk and wholesale supplier of all-natural olive squalane oil (vegan, non-greasy humectant). Serves natural skincare brands, hair care products, and vegan cosmetics. Applications: Deep hydration for skin and hair (10-30%), non-greasy finish. Vegan-friendly with humectant properties. Wholesale pricing ($45-70/kg for bulk orders) with bulk and wholesale quantities. Samples available for bulk customers. Vegan and all-natural certified. USA-based bulk distribution. Bulk order support and product specifications available. Ideal for larger-scale production needs.
